figures.check

Class CheckHorizontal

  • java.lang.Object
    • figures.check.CheckHorizontal

  • public class CheckHorizontal
extends java.lang.Object
    This class checks whether a horizontal move is valid or not.
    Author:
    Timon Borter

      • actualize

        public void actualize(int givenCurrentX,
                      int givenCurrentY,
                      int givenToX,
                      int givenToY,
                      int givenMaxX,
                      PlayerDatas givenPlayerDatas,
                      Figure[][] givenFigures)
        Actualizes all variables with current game informations.
        Parameters:
        givenCurrentX - The current x-coordinate (which the player selected)
        givenCurrentY - The current y-coordinate (which the player selected)
        givenToX - The selected aim x-coordinate
        givenToY - The selected aim y-coordinate
        givenMaxX - The maximal x-coordinates to move
        givenPlayerDatas - Requires the PlayerDatas to check color
        givenFigures - Requires actual figures positions

      • check

        public boolean check()
        Checks the figures move, returns true if it is valid.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the move horizontal is valid
